name: Die Odyssee
overview: The most ambitious work of the game world is undoubtedly this game version of the adventures of ancient Odysseus. The large Greek is squatting in the pub with three buddies at the beginning, fully singing the night and philosophizing about how he could finally end the years of siege of Troy. Then the innkeeper suddenly begins to talk of the enchanted cellar underneath the drinkers , which is said to house an oracle in addition to unspeakable dangers.
